name: Sheep King French Fries
description:
Sheep King French Fries is an funny endless runner platformer. You'll play as the totally cool Patato King, riding your very own freaking awesome sheep in the sky, to the end of the world. Try to avoid the dangerous misiles, and collect french fries and patato kids to maximize your score and hopefully you'll be able to claim the highscore.Check the leaderboard here www.nextpew.com/highscore
